frontmatter.title: Interrupting for Microlearning: Understanding Perceptions and Interruptibility of Proactive Conversational Microlearning Services
frontmatter.description: This project explores how smart speakers can deliver microlearning content at opportune moments, understanding user perceptions and interruptibility patterns for proactive conversational learning services.

frontmatter.title: AI Complaint Classification for University IT Services
frontmatter.description: This project focuses on developing an AI system to automatically classify and route IT service complaints in university environments, improving response times and service quality.
